abstract: The Metropolitan Museum of Art announced today that the spring 2012 exhibit at the Costume Institute will be "Elsa Schiaparelli and Miuccia Prada: On Fashion."
snippet: The Metropolitan Museum of Art announced today that the spring 2012 exhibit at the Costume Institute will be "Elsa Schiaparelli and Miuccia Prada: On Fashion."

headline.main: Prada and Schiaparelli at the Met
